exercises.name: Front Embrace (Pillow Support)
entry: Receiver lies on back; optional pillow under hips for angle.
Giver aligns above; support with forearms to reduce wrist load.

notes: Use lubrication to reduce friction.
Adjust angle and pace to comfort.

source.work: Book II themes + modern sexology mechanics
source.notes: Non-graphic guidance; adjust to comfort and safety.
